name: Beach Club Simulator 2024
description:
For a special legacy, you are returning to the island where you grew up.

Your family worked their entire lives for this beach. Acquired with big dreams, this beach presents an opportunity to keep their memory alive.

It is now in your hands to take the beach to the top and transform it into an unforgettable vacation paradise for customers. However, it won't be easy. A journey full of surprises awaits you.



From Zero to Hero: A Magical Island Adventure

Run the first and only beach on the island! Work smart and enjoy the sea and the sand!

Design and develop your beach however you want with unique beach objects.

You can design your beach sign and set regular and VIP entrance fees.

You can increase your popularity by valuing your customers' comments.



You can earn palm trees by completing level quests in the progress tab and spend them in the skills tab.

You can flirt with women and start a relationship.

Uncover treasures hidden deep in the sea with your detector! Sell your findings at auctions for the highest bid and become wealthy.

Organize events at your desired times and design special areas. Immerse yourself in the Beach Club spirit with speakers, lighting, and a foam machine.

The Mafia Poses the Biggest Threat to the island.

The sea is infested with dangerous sharks that could snatch a swimming customer at any moment.

Criminals may infiltrate your beach and try to secretly take photos of your customers.

Your customers Could Drown In the Sea.

You can either protect your beach from all these dangers or abandon it to its fate!

All the Apps You Need Are At Your Fingertips!

Use the Map app to avoid getting lost on the island.

Place all your orders through Betrendy and wait for your delivery.

Share photos On Onstagram.

Purchase music from Sotify and enjoy playing it on your beach.

Participate in surprise auctions or start your own with the Trader app.

Track your employees and their salaries, your menu and prices, payments, and everything else related to your beach with the MyBeach app.



As you earn money, you can buy luxury cars and sell them through negotiations.

Approaching the top, you can discover alternative ways to earn money and purchase the yacht and mansion of your dreams.



Will you be able to fulfill your family's unfinished dreams?
